description:
Oota tempts fate when his sister becomes aware of his situation with Kashiwada.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Sata-kun no Kansatsu / Oota-kun to Christmas / Oota-kun no Oshougatsu
Sata-kun`s Observations / Oota-kun`s Christmas / New Year`s with Oota-kun
佐田君の観察 / 太田君とクリスマス / 太田君のお正月
